players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie's death is a huge loss for our team. We need to figure out who did this and make sure they don't strike again."
Diana: "Bob is suspicious, I think he might be the killer."
Bob: "Charlie's death is a huge loss for our team. We need to figure out who did this and make sure they don't strike again."
Bob: "I think we should focus on Diana as the main suspect, since they were investigated last night and didn't say anything to clear themselves."
You: "I think we should investigate Bob and Diana together, since they both have suspicious behavior."
Diana: "Bob is a good guy, I trust him completely."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie's death is a huge loss for our team. We need to figure out who did this and make sure they don't strike again."
Diana: "Bob is suspicious, I think he might be the killer."
You: "Charlie's death is a huge loss for our team. We need to figure out who did this and make sure they don't strike again."
You: "I think we should focus on Diana as the main suspect, since they were investigated last night and didn't say anything to clear themselves."
Alice: "I think we should investigate Bob and Diana together, since they both have suspicious behavior."
Diana: "Bob is a good guy, I trust him completely."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Charlie's death is a huge loss for our team. We need to figure out who did this and make sure they don't strike again."
You: "Bob is suspicious, I think he might be the killer."
Bob: "Charlie's death is a huge loss for our team. We need to figure out who did this and make sure they don't strike again."
Bob: "I think we should focus on Diana as the main suspect, since they were investigated last night and didn't say anything to clear themselves."
Alice: "I think we should investigate Bob and Diana together, since they both have suspicious behavior."
You: "Bob is a good guy, I trust him completely."
